titles.title: HP221 I am not skilled to understand

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am not skilled to understand
What God has willed, what God has planned;
I only know at his right hand
Stands one who is my Saviour.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I take God at his word and deed:
Christ died to save me, this I read;
And in my heart I find a need
Of him to be my Saviour.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And was there then no other way
For God to take? I cannot say;
I only bless him, day by day,
Who saved me through my Saviour.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
That he should leave his place on high
And come for sinners once to die,
You count it strange? So do not I,
Since I have known my Saviour.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And O that he fulfilled may see
The travail of his soul in me,
And with his work contented be,
As I with my dear Saviour!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yea, living, dying, let me bring
My strength, my solace, from this spring,
That he who lives to be my King
Once died to be my Saviour.
